I find it incredible that the movies these guys crank out keep making money. Goes to show that if you play to the lowest IQ value you'll never go broke, I guess. Friedberg and Seltzer knock out another low-brow, inane "comedy" parody with VERY little humor that could only appeal to young boys. The Zucker brothers they aren't.Over 49,000 IMDb users have voted on this waste of film. Broken down to its component votes, it rated highest with males under 18 (big surprise), but even they only gave it a 2.7 of 10. Oddly, the group that rated it lowest was males 18-29, and they gave it a 2.1. But across the board - male, female, age groups, inside the US or out, this movie was voted crap by all. Yet somehow, this thing still made $86,000,000 worldwide. And unless people stop paying them off for this junk, you can expect it to keep coming.I could follow the storyline, which is why it got a 2 from me. I save my 1's for movies you can't even follow, like Monster a-Go Go. And it's not like it didn't have something going for it; the lighting was great (thank you Mr. Sun).Otherwise, Epic Movie is a big bucket of suck.

Personally i thought this film was rather funny and i think the idea of films like this is to be completely stupid and (sorry if i offend anyone)...retarded! I actually like this kind of humour and although most of the film was boring and lagging, i think the funny bits were actually quite funny, like the parody of pirates of the Caribbean, i thought the actor playing captain Jack was simply brilliant and did such a funny impersonation.In general i don't think this movie should have been slandered quite as much as it has, it all depends on a persons sense of humour, which in my case is paranormal and a little bit twisted.I'm sure there are many people out there who agree with me but also many people who don't, either way i hope most will at least give this film a chance...the parody of "Snakes on a Plane" is particularly funny! Thank You!

reviews.review_title: This movie makes 'Borat' seem like an Acedamy Award winner
reviews.content: To win the award of "worst movie of the decade", this definitely takes the cake. As each second went by, I regretted with all my being, paying money for this movie. The only good part about going to see it is for experience, and now I could tell everyone what a horrible waste of time and film this movie was. By far one of the worst movies I Have ever had the displeasure of watching.When I went to see this movie, I thought the parody would have at least some comic humor in it, instead it looks as though i twas made for 12 year old, adolescent boys, that are just going through puberty.To make a long review short, people please if you have any sense you will go see something normal, or rent a movie. Or you know what? Go out side, fly a kite. Thid Movie is a waste of life.

reviews.review_title: Stop Being Ignorant and Learn To Laugh.
reviews.content: Im tired of people bashing Friedberg and Seltzer because they are not bad people. Im sure they care about others in real life. But you people are taking this way to far. Epic Movie is hilarious to some people including me and you should stop being the idiots you are and respect the opinions of others.Now onto the movie, Its basically a parody of Narnia, Charlie and The Chocolate Factory and with some references to X-Men The Last Stand. Yeah the jokes can be plagiarized but they probably thought that doing that would be funny.The script I think is the strongest aspect of stupid comedies. It needs to be stupid enough to be funny. They succeed at this. The reason people are driven away from films like this is because they are stupid. THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE.The casting yet again has the same actors from Date Movie. I guess Friedberg and Seltzer like to recycle actors.The Story is OK, Its basically four orphans getting together to fight a evil queen. Rehash but oh well.But, Epic Movie for me is Hilarious. It is one of my favorite comedies in the parody genre. I love it. Now shut up immature people.90/100 A-

Although Friedberg/Sletzer did a worse job with their later movie Disaster Movie this is the film that unfortunately started their success. This film is cheap, unfunny, badly acted, and annoying like all the Friedberg/Seltzer movies. The jokes are the worst part of this terrible movie. They did not ever make me laugh, and they were very annoying. The parodies often aren't even trying to be funny. Sometimes they creep me out. If there is any dialogue that isn't a bad joke it is bad. A lot of times things will barely make any form of sense, and will leave you feeling empty. Although it isn't as bad as Disaster Movie it is still one of the worst films ever made.0 stars out of 4

reviews.review_title: I have lost all faith in Man Kind.
reviews.content: This was the worst Goddamn movie I have ever seen in my entire life. I think the two writers of this movie should be shot. My question is what stupid producer read this and said yeah this is funny, let's make this.It's just one stupid fart joke after another then somebody gets hit with something. It makes me sad, this movie cost I'm guessing maybe over 20 million. That money could have fed a lot of starving kids. I just can't bash this movie enough. I have never been this upset about a movie. I really love movies. This isn't even a movie it's a really long shitty sketch. Shindlers List was funnier than this movie.Don't see it!

Was it really Kal Penn in this useless worthless piece of trash? I saw the film dubbed in Chinese, or maybe it was Russian, and subtitled in Chinese! That was about the most interesting part of this film.It was gross, pathetic and idiotic.Thank god I did not understand what these moronic characters were trying to say. I am sure that lessened my torture by several degrees. What age group was this film targeting? There is no way anyone could have liked this piece of trash! I should have taken a nap instead. Even reading with the danger of puking due to travel sickness might have been better. So I say Nyet Nyet - stay away.

My little brother rented this and gave it 2 me 2 watch with my girl friend. we just turned it off after 10min it was terrible i've watched children's shows which i've enjoyed more, i don't know how films like this get made? really if this can get made my dog bonnie can write a script and we can get millions from her script! i honestly enjoyed watching paint dry more than this the only thing which got a laugh from me was the imitation which were the only plus side well i say the imitation i mean the guy who played captain jack "swallows" he got Johny deeps performance down too a tee. I really don't know what else could be said about this really poor film other than how dare this film be made and other's get turned down!

reviews.review_title: Total thrash. The worst movie i have ever seen
reviews.content: I had nothing to do one night and saw that epic movie was on HBO and figured how bad could it be? 30 minutes later I could not stand the atrocity that this movie is and had to shut it of. If you are considering watching this movie you should instead shove a fork in your eye. The flashing lights of the ambulance will be far more entertaining than this movie was and the pain will be half as bad. This movie was just one unfunny, pointless, idiotic, pop culture reference after another. From the "parodying" (and i use that term loosely)of cribs which was completely pointless to the river of poo instead of chocolate in Willy's chocolate factory. Instead of trying to make clever, witty, and funny jokes they try and parody as many movies as they can as the writers feel that is what people want. I miss the days when spoofs actually had clever references and subtle jabs to the movies they were parodying. Mel Brooks was the master of the spoof genre and made some of the funniest movie because he understood how to make references to movies and not have them entirely consume the spoof itself. The writers of this awful, awful movie have put a stain on American cinema which i hope will not be a model for future movies. I do not know what is more amazing to me the fact that there was some idiots who were writing this movie saying "Hey this is gonna be awesome!" or the fact that some studio actually made this.

reviews.review_title: So dumb that you need add it to your collection
reviews.content:
Its a 6 as long as you percieve it as a bunch of B Rated actors being kidnapped at gunpoint, tossed onto the stage and told them to remember this script and hope for the best.
Of course a couple of these actors got real rolls later on its just super entertaining to see them do this movie as if they wanted to do this while on some substanceThe plot itself was all over the place let alone no a
Actual plot some pretty disturbing scenes, cheesy stereotypes, terrible insults,couple catchy sing a longs and no haooy ending. I like to think of this movie as an on screen fail and you simply get to watch a movie thats the opposite of what hollywood supposed to achieve. It will fill a place in my heart along with the starving games,fast five, young frankstein(which was actually well done)

reviews.review_title: it sucks big balls. ( not the bouncing balls)
reviews.content: i like spoofs. i went to the theater to watch it and my god it was fking cr*p. i only watched 20 minutes and i was completely bored, this movie is ridiculous i swear i am never gonna watch spoofs again not after this one.this movie is stupid, ridiculous, full of sh*t, and probably the worst movie and spoof ever made.this is what i have to say to the directors. " you guys should have never been existed and i don't want to watch your movies till i am alive.the parts that i hate well what i can say is a i hated every single part in the movie there is. i wasted my money and why did they make meet the Spartans. i think they made because they want to be ashamed and want to be the worst directors in history.

reviews.review_title: Kal Penn should be busy playing Kumar
reviews.content: What is Kal Penn doing? A lame sequel to Van Wylder and a silent role in Superman Returns when he could be doing something useful like a sequel to Harold and Kumar Go To Whitecastle. Or a few sequels to it. They should be the next Cheech and Chong, but no. Who is his agent? Is a spoof movie has nothing to say about what it is spoofing then why bother? And why such a broad definition of "Epic?" This "Epic Movie" is the film equivalent of a bunch of kids with A.D.D chatting about random movie titles, "Did your see this, did you see that? Yeah? Me too! And what about that one? And this? " No real opinion or analysis or anything personal just reference instead of observation.I have great respect for spoofs and satire when they are done well. What sticks with you is the spirit of something and some thematic glue that holds it together. That glue could have been a disdain for pop culture in general and the shallowness of it, but instead that glue is merely sniffed by Epic Movie.Thank God I saw it for free thanks to a bootlegger who should go to jail for recording this in a theater. As damaging as that act is, greater damage is done by the industry itself for defecating out movies like this one.

I was hoping this would be funny like the Scary movies. It was a bore from start to finish with only a few chuckles along the way. Unlike some of the other parody movies this one losses it's way fast. The few humorous moments it does provide are when they poke fun at other movies. There just was not enough of this in Epic Movie. Instead it seems to get tied up in The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe storyline. This gets old and boring real fast. I must say that the theater was packed with 14 year old kids who seemed to enjoy it. Don't waist your money to even rent this piece of crap when it gets on DVD. I would predict that will be sometime next week.

This film is garbage, and thats all i have to say about it. But since my comment has to be at least 10 lines here go some of my thoughts on it. The script absolute filth. the jokes they piled on top of each other like a pile of crap and none of them were funny. the characters they were just atrocious and don't even get me started on the acting. worse than awful a mix of bad taste stupidity and unbelievable neglect to the human intellect. simplistic and terrible, poorly written. it looked like it took the writers about an hour or less to complete the script. now i know the journey always seems easier for the one who hadn't taken it but putting my self in place of Aaron and Jason, the writers of the film, i would either spend some time on writing something smarter or change the subject and back away from the genre of parody. and the saddest part it had kal penn in it. after seeing him in harold and kumar i wasn't expecting to see him in such a stupid movie, in case he did not know, it's called turning down the role, lots of famous actors do it. and unlike will smith, who dropped the role of neo and regretted it afterwards, kal penn would have been proud if he did drop the role. one more thing before i leave. AARON AND JASON PLEASE STOP WITH THESE HORRIBLE MOVIES. DATE MOVIE WAS BAD ENOUGH.

I can safely say this is one, if not THE, worst film i have ever been unlucky enough to see.I went to see it last week with my girlfriend and found myself apologising to her for suggesting we see it.The film tries to spoof a couple of recent movies but fails miserably. The writers use the same poor jokes over and over again and i don't think i laughed once. I'm sure that they could have thought up something a bit more original than 'The White B**ch'. Bottom line: Immature, poor and a waste of anybody's time. Don't even bother thinking about seeing this film.

4 orphans embark on an epic adventure....which lasts little more than an hour. i have to wonder how stupid these filmmakers think the American public is....and how stupid are we if this was the top movie in the country? the action makes little sense, though they seem to be trying to follow the plot of "narnia" most of all. "pirates", "superman", "xmen" and " harry potter" all get spanked, and i kept wincing as cameo after cameo came on-screen (why, Jennifer? why, Fred?). the only moment that made me smile even the smallest bit was Crispin Glover doing his riff on "Willy Wonka". though it seemed, as it did in most places in the film, that they were really trying way too hard to shoehorn the story into the movie spoofs.the worst offender here was Kai Penn, i think. after seeing him doing an excellent job lately on "24", this was just embarrassing....

The guys who wrote/directed this (and the terrible Date Movie) should truly be ashamed of themselves for how terrible the movies they make are. It's hard to believe this crap gets funding really, and I feel bad for Crispin Glover, he really is better than playing Willy Wonka in a spoof. I can't even comment on anything that was decent about it, because there wasn't anything, the acting, dialogue, music direction, pacing all truly some of the worst I've ever seen. I'd rather watch Manos Hands Of Fate. Hopefully they will never make another movie.

Don't know why you people don't like spoofs, but i like them in any form the come in. This one had me howling right from the word go, with the da vinci code spoof. The old guy dancing, and this girl a cindy (remember scary movies) type buffoon, and the incredibly funny assassin. Then the snakes in the plane scene was also hilarious, although xmen and nacho libre and harry potter spoofs were kinda dumb. I felt it could have done much more good if it hadn't put narnia as the central spoof. Pirates spoof was good, with the guy spoofing jack sparrow doing a superb job of it. And during the credits the mel Gibson spoof had be on my all fours howling away.the also guy was also funny, and the white bitch nick had me rolling away. The sudoku spoof was also great.All in all 6/10 !!

Ohkay, so it's not the best movie in the world.But it's worth seeing.I personally thought that parts of it were hilarious.And Jayma Mays (Lucy) was amazing.She's gorgeous and she played the part very well.She's so unbelievably funny.But overall. The movie kind of sucked. But I'd still see it again.It might not be a 5 star kind of movie, but it's ripping the box office up.Doesn't that say something?

First time ever i was speechless after the movie... because it was so damn terrible.OK, before i start bashing Epic Movie, i'll admit that there were at least 3-5 funny parts within the movie (luckily they spread them throughout the movie, otherwise if they carried on with pointless gags, i would of just got up and left the cinema).After watching "Harold and Kumar - Go to the White Castle" (good comedy movie), seeing Kal Penn's face in "Epic Movie", i would of thought it would be hella funny... (might be just me, but without any materials with Swearing, Drugs or Sex, a movie cannot be funny).It was just so badly scripted (even though it does not have a script, but just ripping other movies off, at least try to pull the movie together).Lucy (Jayma Mays), who i am assuming is trying to be like Cindy Campbell (from Scary Movie, which she cannot pull it off) just tries to hard to act stupid and hardly isn't funny at all.Peter (Adam Campbell), being British myself could not see the funny side to him. He was not funny in Date Movie either... only part i found funny in Epic Movie with him was the superman part, that was about it.Susan (Faune A. Chambers), i wasn't expecting much from her and pretty much didn't see any comedy from her anyways.Edward (Kal Penn), i expected him to be funny... but he wasn't... the chemistry between him and the a other actors just was not right and just made him boring.Well to sum up, "worst episode ever" (aka. Crap Movie). You are better off watching Scary Movie 1/2/3/4 (and upcoming 5)Don't waste your time watching this movie, you will understand if you have watched the movie already and you are reading this comment... if not, wait for the DVD and rent it then you'll understand my comments...

This movie was hilarious Defintly Better than date movie It was so funny I laughed through the whole Movie. It spoofs: Pirates of the Caribbean, Superman returns, The DA Vinci Code, Chronicles of Narnia, Charlie & The Chocolate Factory,X-men, Harry potter, Nacho Libre, Snakes on a plane. All were Hilarious. some Funny one liners About Harold & Kumar Go to white Castle American pie "stiflers mom" Its Great all,In good fun but not for everyone. Plenty of gross out humor what the Directors Are Known for. I went for a Good laugh And thats Exactly what i Got. I love it It also spoof some MTV type shows Like Punked Cribs Scarface So inconclusion If You like Gross Humor or the Scary Movie Franchise Go See This Movie If not Pass This up

This film is so bad that it is less like watching a film and more like having a film beamed into your skull from a malign planet of crap. If I had anything to do with this film I wouldn't want my name on it, near it or even referenced in it.This film is such a money grabbing exploit that it makes me wonder how they can get away with it. The script is non existent, there's no plot and no original gags. Bad performances and terrible music makes one thankful that it was all over in 68 minutes. All of which makes it seem like a crime they charge people to see it. They should pay us!!! The makers of this tosh add credence to my argument to bring back stockades to humiliate bad people in public. They took my money and now I want to throw rotten fruit at them. Who's with me?

OUCH!!! No more beating, please.... Um, did i just saw what could be the worst movie of all times? No, that's wrong, the worst movie ever is "Men In White" (you know, the one made for the TV). But that Epic B******T is very close.Of course i knew there would be no acting, but i did expect some laughs. Well, wrong again there. Although i remember i smiled in one - (repeat) - one - (and in number) - 1 part of the movie. All the other parts i was really crying the money i gave at the rental shop. For some weird reason, i thanked myself many times during the movie for not going to the theaters to see it.Actually, it's movies like these that makes us appreciate the real GOOD ones, so we should thank the producers for keep giving money to make horrible movies. They truly work for our benefit. Yeah. (Got to remember to remain serious).OK, only one advise. For whatever you think it's holy, stay away from this one. At least a country away. Or, even better, a planet. Or a solar system. The list can easily go on and on.(I still hurt from the beating i took........)
DO NOT WATCH PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DO NOT WATCH UNLESS YOU LIKE PAIN IN WHICH CASE THIS IS THE MOVIE FOR YOU

reviews.review_title: I would have rather stabbed my self for 1 hour and 25 minutes...
reviews.content: Do I really need to say more than that? Well just in case... think of all the most un-funny, un-original moments in all of the Scary Movies put together and what you have is Epic movie... shame on you Kumar... and David Caradine... AND Crispin Glover!!! I may have laughed once or twice at an actual funny joke but most of the humor came at how bad the gags in this movie were and how long and drawn out it was. There was no sense of pacing at all... Fred Willard in a blond mullet and pants was just plain wrong... the only saving grace of this movie was Carmen Electra in a tight blue jumpsuit and body paint... still not worth the 8 bucks I paid to see it... I am all for stupid humor... but stupid alone does not a movie make!

reviews.review_title: 1 hour of my live i'll never get back
reviews.content: You have to be really into s&m to enjoy watching this movie , the term mind-numbing agony or excruciating pain come to mind after watching it , funny bit is that it came highly recommended by many friends as "hilarious" . Don't fall for the same trick , saying I giggled 2 times during the movie is exaggerating blatantly . The humor is predictable and very VERY lame and i highly recommend against anyone putting themselves through the horror of watching it.It attempts to mock several high-budget Hollywood productions such as The chronicles of narnia , x-men or The pirates of the Caribbean . The movie kicks of with wrestling midgets ffs , anyways maybe JUST maybe you could like it if you have the sense of humour of a 10 year old

reviews.review_title: Bad film. Bad Film. Danger! Will Robinson. Danger!
reviews.content: Why is it that year after year Hollywood puts out a flood of really cheesy movies disguised as fun spoofs? They are really bad films and to think that this one even got made...Prime example "Epic Movie" I only found two gags funny and the film sucked, really badly. I'd put the Scary Movie series in here too except for the very first one which I did find funny but after that they just got worse and worse.... Though the final one was kind of alright because they sent up Tom Cruise and WOTW, but that didn't redeem it by much.And in the same light I put "Epic Movie" because it was a waste of both money and time. Which I can't ever get back. Avoid this film at all costs.It'll be in the $5 DVD bin before too long

Epic Movie, the latest installment of the "spoof" movies. I really didn't want to rent this, but I was talked into it (at least it wasn't my money spent on it). I sat down and watched it, and ended up asking myself "Are all those stupid references to Hollywood/celebrities/music REALLY necessary?" If you take those out, then Epic Movie is actually pretty funny by spoof movie standards. But those music video/MTV/whatever the hell you wanna call it references just slow the movie down, don't deliver laughs, and make me want to smack my head with my shoe.Epic Movie is WAY better than Date Movie, and probably better than Scary Movie 4, but it falls (way) short of Scary Movie 1-3, and any other spoof movie that came before Scary Movie 4. If you want to watch it, make sure the rental is cheap.

reviews.review_title: Met my expectations... But failed to exceed them
reviews.content: I was lucky enough to see an advanced screening..This movie is sure to get future comments saying its lame, boring and stupid... I don't agree... Epic Movie is hilarious but is definitely not for everyone.. Don't walk into the movie theater expecting anything special because you wont get it, However if you walk into the theater looking for a fun experience then Epic Movie will deliver. It spoofs all the blockbusters released over the past 2 years and it does it very well, they are all binded together in a similar way to scary movie 1.Acting isn't to bad either.."Epic Movie" is definitely worth a watch.. So what are you waiting for?

I think people are out there attacking movies, I've seen one review where somebody gave this movie a 1, which is the worst it could ever be, obviously this person hasn't seen any BAD movies.This movie is definitely not the worst, I've seen all the movies that this movie parodies, and let me tell you it is very funny. I don't really have a favourite character in this movie, however I did love Jennifer Coolidge as "White Bitch". I thought she was very funny, along with Adam Campbell from "Date Movie" and Kal Penn from "Harold & Kumar Go To White Castle".It parodies such movies as, "Harry Potter", "The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe", "Pirates of the Caribbean" and Superman 4", along with a few others. I loved the parodies and let me tell you they were really funny.Like I said, this isn't the worst movie I've ever seen, but it's not the best, so that's why I'm giving it a 6. I know most people are thinking, "what the heck am I thinking" but I got to tell you guys, there are worse movies out there, trust me. This movie got a few laughs out of me, OK more than a few, yes there were parts of the movie that was a little boring, but than it picked up again. I'm definitely getting this movie when it comes out on Blu-ray!

reviews.review_title: Not Worth the $10 I Spent to Watch It
reviews.content: All in all, it's just another lame parody with the same ol' cast of characters making fun of other films. The problem with this one is that the main four characters just aren't all that funny or sympathetic. You can't laugh at them all that much, and you can't feel for their predicaments, so you just sit there and watch them go through this series of (un)fortunate events and hope to hell to get a belly laugh every now and then.And there are a few...mind you, a FEW, genuine laughs in the movie. But the audience has already seen them if they've seen the trailers.It seems to me that the production companies when they come up with this level of bad movie--better than DATE MOVIE, not as good as the lame SCARY MOVIE 4--it's a matter these days of coming up with an ad campaign to get as many people into the theater the first weekend, and hope to hell you recoup as much of your money as possible. They spent WEEKS advertising this, and for what? Maybe ten minutes of belly laughs and the rest just a meandering morass of muck.My recommendation: wait until it's on cable or comedy central.

reviews.review_title: This advice will help you for the rest of your life.
reviews.content: When you are getting your wallet from your pocket to pay to watch this, go to the next guy you see, pay him 500,000 monopoly money to stick his arm into your mouth, and rip out the tonsils, and throw it at your face.What's so epic about lame jokes and lame ideas? If you still don't get how bad this is, it is a bad movie but grown up with a I.Q. of a 1 second baby.And just so you know, I'm a teenager, and I hated this. My 9 year old brother hated this. They failed at jokes like a chicken fails at flying. I searched up the definition of epic:-adjective Also, ep.i.cal. 1. noting or pertaining to a long poetic composition, usually centered upon a hero, in which a series of great achievements or events is narrated in elevated style: Homer's Iliad is an epic poem. 2. resembling or suggesting such poetry: an epic novel on the founding of the country. 3. heroic; majestic; impressively great: the epic events of the war. 4. of unusually great size or extent: a crime wave of epic proportions. -noun 5. an epic poem. 6. epic poetry. 7. any composition resembling an epic. 8. something worthy to form the subject of an epic: The defense of the Alamo is an American epic. 9. (initial capital letter) Also called Old Ionic. the Greek dialect represented in the Iliad and the Odyssey, apparently Aeolic modified by Ionic.Yeah, so not epic.If you didn't listen to my advice above, have fun gouging your eyes out, and make the guy next to you eat it.
Well I will say one thing about this film. It's so terrible that it's so funny with its parody humor and special effects that make it so bad enough to perhaps watch it only once.

Wow I loved this movie, Yea, everybody, either you love it or you hate it. I loved it, it made fun of all those really cheesy movies of some different world that they put on the screen. BUT, their are some things that I disliked about the movie, I don't know if it was the case for other languages, but I watched it in the french translation, and only half of it was translated. The other half they just put subtitles. How annoying :( . Anywho, I don't know whats so bad about it. Stt making such a big deal out of it. Just because you can't laugh because you have no life, it dose't mean that it was that bad. So yea sure they're were some really random parts, their just parodying really cheesy movies.

The ensemble cast of Epic Movie is a mix of actors with various levels of spoofing ability. In the leads, Penn (Van Wilder 2) is clearly the most adept. He approaches the ridiculous with a knowing level of sarcasm. He's like, ''It sucks to be in a stupid spoof and I'm going to point it out.'' Mays (TV's Heroes) plays Lucy as if Forrest Gump were playing mentally challenged. There's no payoff to her ditziness. Campbell (Date Movie) plays Peter like a prancing, preening wuss. Nobody ever taught him that spoof characters have to play it straight. And Chambers (White Chicks) plays Susan with no personality whatsoever. She's not even the generically sassy black chick. Spoof veteran Carmen Electra is almost unrecognizable as Mystique, another hot chick in blue, while the Johnny Depp clones are expertly cast, especially Hammond as the effeminate Jack Swallows (Get it?). Glover as the effeminate Willy is also scary. Finally, Fred Willard nearly steals the show as a sex-crazed lion man, while Jennifer Coolidge could pout her lips in a tragedy and still be hilarious.

me and my mates went to see this, loaded on booze and sugary drinks. i expected more of the same trashy, noughties American humour we all saw in the Scary Movies 3 and 4. what i got was worse.we stayed for an hour, during which we never so much as cracked a smile. and we were drunk, mind. everything was mind numbingly predictable, it just didn't seem possible that the film makers expected anyone to find it funny.'white witch' becomes 'white bitch'. big wows.the 'white bitch's sleigh becomes a pimp mobile. genius, or so they wished.when they go into the fawn person's home they try to spoof MTV cribs, but fail.there is a pointless, 5 minute fight scene that aims to try slapstick for size, but again it fails willy wonka does various evil things to them. never saw that coming.Paris hilton, kanye west and Britney spears are all targeted for satire. failure to be even slightly amusing in every case.there's an attempt at ghetto humour every 2 minutes, but it's so poorly executed it becomes monotonous.various recurring jokes, like the white lassie repeating everything the black lassie says, would drive even the most open minded person to suicide.i could go on, but bloody hell. this film deserves to be erased from cultural history, nineteen eighty four style. the world's an international policed state as it is, i'd say for the greater good this mess of a movie should be burned.

reviews.review_title: It's official...the dumbest movie I have ever seen.
reviews.content: Okay so my friends wanted me to go with them to see this movie one weekend. I had already seen the previews for this movie before I even went and I thought it was going to be stupid anyway but I didn't think it was going to be THIS bad. I thought there were going to be some funny parts but there was only like one part that just made me only chuckle. It was a waste of my time and my money. I wouldn't recommend this movie to anyone, it was the dumbest movie I have ever seen and I wouldn't want to torture myself by seeing it again. I don't see how this could be a "funny" movie. There weren't any good parts except for maybe the Paris Hilton part (which was the one part that made me chuckle). The Willy Wonka part was disgusting, the Superman part was stupid, the Da Vinci Code was pointless, the Snakes on a Plane was extremely stupid with that guy just repeating the same line over and over, and the Pirates of the Caribbean part was not even funny and perverted (which is why I'm glad I didn't go with my parents). It was all stupid/elementry school jokes basically the whole time during this movie.Overall-It sucked more than I thought it would....They said it was from 2 of the 5 makers of Scary Movie?? Yeah right it must not have been the funny ones because Scary Movie is WAYY better than this.

I've heard plenty about how people are going to see this movie and leave disappointed. They say it's stupid, plot less, and filled with cult-references.To be completely honest, they're right. But if you come into this movie expecting any less than what you saw in the Scary Movies, then of course you'll be upset. This movie isn't made to go down as a classic. It's made to keep teenagers entertained.And, trust me, it does.Parodying every intense summer movie (from X-Men to Narnia, Pirates of the Caribbean to Da Vinci Code), Epic Movie delivers hilarious lines, entertaining slap-humor, and makes even the most action-packed films of the summer look simply ridiculous. The acting isn't top-notch and the special effects aren't special...but that's simply what makes the movie funnier. People will surely laugh when they see a Japanese stunt double in clear view and a stunt manikin collapse to the ground.If nothing else, this movie is a fantastic and hilarious Friday night out. If you're expecting a comedy (and not a PARODY movie), then, yeah, you'll be a little upset.

reviews.review_title: the money spent making it could've benefited the poor more.
reviews.content: what were they thinking when they finished writing this "comedy"? It was horrible in every sense of the word. The director should be shot, and the actors hanged.Ye ye, the idea of making a film to make fun of other films seems good, but hardly original anymore, its the same crap over and over this movie tried too hard to be funny but failed miserably, hence, bottom 100 (#30). it has...one...maybe, just maybe, two 'funny' scenes, but thats it.The biggest waste of $15 ever, now i have to spend more money buying a rope to hang myself with ! After watching this movie you are guaranteed to walk out of the cinema/ living room saying "what the Fudge was that".Don't say you weren't warned AVOID !

this movie looks like it is trying to steal the thunder of scary movie 4 and other movies that has hit the market. This reminds me of a bad plot of date movie. Even I think some of the cast from that date movie made it into this movie except Alyson. I do like the spoof on superman getting the bullet in his eye that is kind of backwards play on things, but really this film lacks any originality and reminds me of an MTV made movie or one of those things you see at the MTV video movie awards you know. Even the JT matrix spoof has a better plot then this one. By the way that was a good skit that MTV did of that you should go check that out instead of this movie. This movie is a DVD rental for sure

When I went to see this movie, I expected it to be really funny...I was wrong. This movie is so stupid it made me wonder "Who wrote this stupid movie??" Not only is it unfunny and over-written, but also this movie makes stupid jokes at movies such as Harry Potter, Willy Wonka, Chronicles of Narnia... should I go on? This movie was a total waste of my time and money but at least the popcorn was good. I really don't get why people in Hollywood keep making silly movie spoofs. It's so not refreshing and annoying to see so many movies spoofs coming out. When will they make an original movie?? If I made this movie, I would change the title to "Worst Movie Ever"

The most mind-boggling film I have watched. If you have never watched this film you have to, as it is the best film I've ever watched (Not including 'Good Burger') due to all the intense scenes. I think this film got me the most attached to the characters ever (Also not including 'Young Sheldon') because the acting is on point. I've watched this film over 50 times I would say and every joke still cracks me and my family up. This movie makes Kanye West feel like a bad rapper. This movie makes Ninja feel bad at fortnite. This movie makes the story to Breaking Bad seem bad and boring. The acting on this movie makes the acting in the wolf of Wall Street feel like a joke. This movies action scenes make cobra Kai feel mid. This movie has every character ever dreamt of from Willy Wonker to Jack Sparrow. I have creamed my panties more times I want to admit watching this film. I don't understand how this film is so slept on because the whole film had me laughing and creaming. This movie is the peak of cinematography and ever since the release of this film there hasn't been a better movie. Please take this review seriously because I'm being madly serious.Thanks for reading my review.

reviews.review_title: lame lame lame lame lame stupid lame lame lame
reviews.content: This is the crappiest movie ever to be made. This was a waste of my time that I could have used to go to the toilet 'cause doing that is better than watching this movie. Stupid jokes, lame humor, crap actors, even crappier sets, and did I say stupid jokes. Not once in the movie did I even think about smiling. DO NOT WASTE MONEY ON THIS. Rather flush the money down the toilet. I cannot believe that any studio actually payed these people to make such a crap movie. This should have gone straight to VHS 'cause its to crap to go to DVD. I will actually buy myself this movie when its on DVD just to break the thing into million pieces.

OK people I know this is a bias opinion because honestly i could not make it through this entire movie.. I had to walk out.. or fall asleep don't remember which one...But I think that this movie might have a good thing... We have hit rock bottom. It cannot get any worse... or can it? Well the only thing I can hope is that studios start putting an end to this drivel... I respect IMDb's opinions as well as RT's because they are made up of the "us" You will always have basher's but for the most part you will get a genuine feeling for the overall performance of a movie. But for the love of god someone stick a fork in this abomination....

reviews.review_title: Crappy! So not worth your time!
reviews.content: I saw this movie a few weeks ago with a friend of mine and wasted a perfectly good movie pass to see it. I should have listened to my gut instinct and waited until the movie had been properly review by qualified film critics.This movie is "crap" in every sense of the word! There's really no story in this movie, so the "synopsis" follows four "orphans" as they come together, discover they're brothers and sisters, and stop the evil White B@#!$ who allegedly killed their parents. From that point on, there is no plot. It's just taking some really good movies and turning them into crap.I would say hilarity ensues, but there was very little in this movie that was hilarious. Most of the jokes were crude, obnoxious, or gross-out. There were a few things that made me laugh, such as Mr. Tumnus' crib, Captain Jack Swallows, the White Queen's turbo sled, and even adding some Imperial stormtroopers to the Queen's army. Unfortunately, these jokes aren't enough to save the movie.It seems all spoof movies these days are about being rude and gross. The movies being spoofed are just in there as a backdrop for the movie's "dumb time." Half the movies spoofed in this movie, such as Borat, Nacho Libre, Willy Wonka and Click, aren't even epics. For my final thought, I would just like to ask, "Wouldn't it be great if they made a spoof movie that was actually funny?"If you have any dignity, or respect for the movies spoofed in this movie, then avoid this movie.

reviews.review_title: So horrible, I feel numb inside.
reviews.content: For much of the movie, I could not come up with the words to express my reaction to it. Except for scene from the Wonka "spoof", there was nothing in this movie that elicited a reaction. At least that scene had me groaning that they took the gross fork in the road. Then, about 3 hours into this movie, I figured out why I didn't like it. Put simply, it's just not entertaining.Granted, I haven't even seen a few of the movies they were allegedly sending up, but I am certain that, had I seen "The Chronicles of Narnia," I still wouldn't be able to figure out why what was taking place on the screen was supposed to be funny. And when the writers were on the cusp of putting together something humorous, like the age of the Harry Potter cast, they couldn't leave well enough alone, and unnecessarily went over the top.This movie was so unentertaining that it (combined with an entire tub of popcorn) made it necessary for me to leave the theatre 10 minutes before I could have sneaked into "Departed", just to cleans myself of the experience.Don't even rent this one.

Epic Movie is quite possibly, no is without a doubt, the absolute worst bomb of a movie that was ever made. We could spent centuries searching the universe for a greater abomination, and come up empty. Epic Movie is the anti-Christ, no, the anti-Christ of the anti-Christ. It's not only the bottom of the barrel - its when you pick the barrel up and scrape the grease off of the worms under the barrel. Epic movie is an event in which, ten years from now, we will be holding candle-light vigils for the day in which it came out. I would rather be chased down by a pride of angry lions, and then be skinned by rabid badgers than watching this hideous, poorly-made, infantile, bush-league, awe-inspiringly bad, heretical movie again. Within 5 minutes of this movie, the guy in back of me's jaw fell 10 feet and hit me in the back of the head from the shear horror of what we were seeing. He then died of cardiac arrest, an exit to the misery that was Epic Movie. There is not ONE funny moment in this entire movie. The fact that it is labeled a comedy is not only an insult to comedy, but an insult to us all. 5 year olds see this movie and become scarred for life. 50 year olds see this and want to end their life. Do not, if you have any faith or love of the world left, see Epic Movie. If George Bush were to do ONE thing right in the rest of his lame duck Presidency, he would do a house-to-house round up of all copies of Epic Movie (should be easy, as nobody would EVER buy this), and bury them in the desert next to ET, the game. We would then pulverize them hundreds of times, burn them, and then seal the ashes in concrete. These ashes would be further destroyed by nuking them in the middle of the ocean. If there was even a smithereens left, we could then bury it. Even then, we would never be sure that it was gone.0 / 10

Well, I rented this movie out of curiosity - and, to paraphrase the older gent out of the Simpsons "I lost two hours of my life, and I want them back." I have no idea what happened here (I can make some guesses - but I suspect it wouldn't be posted for fear of slander). What I don't understand is how this thing could of ever been made. The problem with the film is that is a poorly organized collection of attempts at spoofing hit films using comedic elements that are mostly puerile and sophomoric (basically it looks like it was written by people with the comic sense of a elementary school kid). I mean, there is a take off on Willy Wonka where the guy starts eating chocolate from a river and cannot stop, and is then told it is a sewage line.The film is extremely muddled and disorganized. It's really hard to describe. It is almost unwatchable.Yeah, there were a couple of high points - seeing Fred Willard again was one, and the part where the Fred Willard character was Kung Fu fighting using an obviously Asian double was actually good - but that was it. Some of the beginning was good - the Davinci code knockoff was OK. But that was it. And, for no apparent reason, there are a couple of unclad females - nice to look at but irrelevant.If you want to see good movie spoofs - watch "Airplane", "Hot Shots", the vastly under-rated "Top Secret!" and "Spaceballs" - these movies succeed without resorting to excessive stupid humor and do not require that the watcher have intimate knowledge of the movies they're spoofing. The movies also have a coherent story (note to writers - WATCH THESE FILMS AND LEARN!!!!!)

Epic Movie is similar to all the other parodies that the former scary movie writers are brining to the big screen. It focuses around the Chronicles or Narnia and then parodies an unbelievable amount of films such as Xmen, Yo MTV Cribs, Pirates of the Caribbean, Davinci Code, Superman, Punked. They have also added spoofs of celebrities such as Paris Hilton, Kanye West, Flavor Flav, etc. This movie does not work on any level. It is truly not funny. The character of Harry Beaver was not funny. The Slapstick was forced and not that funny, I did not laugh, smile, snicker etc once during viewing this film. It may rank with Date Movie and Freddie got Fingered as one of the worst theatrical releases ever. Kal Penn and Fred Willard are better than this movie. The female lead is also a poor imitation of Anna Faris. Avoid this movie.

reviews.review_title: One of the Worst Movies I've Seen in a Long Time
reviews.content: To be honest, I only went to see Epic Movie because my fiancée wanted to see it. I went in expecting very little, and the movie didn't even deliver that much. Throughout the entire movie there are only a few scattered chuckles, and not a single real laugh. You really know that a movie like this has failed when its parody of another movie (an action movie!) is less funny than the original. This happens in its parody of Snakes on a Plane, which is really just a very silly reenactment of some of the funnier parts of SoaP.While severely deficient in the humor department, the movie is, however, filled with plenty of gross-out moments, so if you're into that, by all means go. But if you want to see a decent movie or if you even want to laugh at a silly movie, you should avoid this like the plague. Don't spend $8 on a movie ticket, don't rent it, don't even watch it for free. You'll just be wasting your time.

I thought this movie was really funny and the characters, despite their ridiculousness were genuinely likable. Sure it wasn't exactly Oscar-bait or a what some might call a cinematic masterpiece, but it made me laugh dammit and laugh a lot. With all that's going on in the world these days, that's a precious and valuable commodity, and I don't think people should scorn it. I think one of the reasons this is the most popular film in theatres right now is that it's just plain funny and people like to have something to laugh at. While I liked Borat, which all the critics are apparently ga-ga for right now, I thought this movie was a lot funnier, had more plot, more gags per second and was less cruel to real people.Look, if you're looking for the latest depressing Clint Eastwood directorial effort, this obviously isn't it, but if you're looking for some ridiculous silly humor, this is a great way to spend a few hours in my opinion

When you almost fall asleep during a movie during the afternoon it says a lot. All the jokes have been done hundreds of times before already and usually much better. It makes Little man seem like a masterpiece (and that was a terrible movie too). Thank god it lasted only 70 minutes because there's only so much bad taste a human can take. I find it unbelievable that anyone would dare to sign his name to this piece of crap and that there is a studio who would dare to distribute such utter filth just to make a few bucks. It's a new low for Hollywood after an already disastrous year in 2006 but I guess so long as stupid people can be separated from their money with so little effort we're in for an even worse year now.

Epic Movie? Scary Movie is the only films that are funny, the hell with Date Movie and Epic Movie, seriously this was one of the worst comedies i've ever seen. I can't believe those who voted 10 on it, probably some 12 year old kid. The jokes were bad and it felt like there was no point about this movie, they just wanted to do a parody on new films, i mean who the hell does a parody on "Borat" ?!. And the plot is the worst i've ever seen, the guy who wrote it is missing brains, he made sure that everything should fit in with the parodies, such as "Narnia" "Da Vinci Code" etc, no offense but this couldn't been done any WORSE. A weak 4/10 from me! There is nothing less to say than: The worst movie-movie ever!

reviews.review_title: This movie had maybe 3 good minutes out of 120 total minutes
reviews.content: I figured since this movie was directed by Jason Friedberg, it would be a pretty good movie. Jason Friedberg wrote scary movie 1, and did characters for scary movie 2,3,and 4. He also wrote Date Movie. I enjoyed all these movies and I believe gave them 5 or 6 stars instead of a TWO.Jason Friedberg really disappointed me here. I was cracking up like HELL in scary movie and date movie. In Epic Movie, i wanted to kill myself towards the end.I also respect Kal Penn from previous movies such as Harold and Kumar go to white castle, and when he appeared on 24 and Law and Order SVU. He was okay in this movie. His acting was not as best done as I thought it would be.but don't get me wrong, i laughed for a little while. Such as when they featured a scene from Borat,and Nachoooooooo Libre. But other than that the Gnarnia scenes, Pirates of Caribbean scenes, and Snakes on a plane scene were just ridiculous.Anyways to the breakdown, this movie wasn't greatly done. And was most definitely not worth my 9 dollars. Therefor i say DO NOT SEE THIS FILM unless you are 13 and with your friends and just want somewhere to go and get out of the house.It is really not worth it and I am highly disappointed. Thank you.

Pre-Glee Jayma Mays is a delight. All of the celebrity spoofs are terrific. The art direction is wonderful, and no expense is spared in re- creating the sets of Narnia, Pirates of the Caribbean, Snakes on the Plane, and Willy Wonkaland. The musical numbers are colorful and good take-offs of the stuff they're mocking.There are 100 talented actors doing bits and cameos and this montage is a career- starter for many of them, deservedly so. While it's not as raucously hilarious as Airplane, it is good fun for a rainy day, and it made me feel good.

reviews.review_title: A pretty cheesy movie but not bad
reviews.content: I when in to epic movie with high hopes only to leave the cinema a little dazzled. The movie it self is good, it is great how they put so many films into one movie and have it make scense. First things first is I loved Kal Penn in HAROLD and KUMAR but in epic movie he acts a little stupid. For all the fan that liked date movie I strongly recommend this film but for people interested in a reel comedy DO NOT SEE THIS MOVIE!!!! Me I love comedy its the spice of life. But when u watch stupid comedy it really not funny.I suggest u wait until it comes out on DVD because its not worth going to movies and paying money to watch. TRUST ME IM A BLOODY MOVIE ADDICT.

reviews.review_title: Wow. Just ... wow. Someone actually dared to make this movie.
reviews.content: ... and me and two friends went to see it. Double feature, right after Spiderman 3. Having been warned by other friends (well, one, at least), and the low rating here. End result? Well, i've learned that nothing beats seeing a movie in person. Was it gross? Definitely. Was it stupid? Of course. Subtlety of a steam-hammer? Check. Effects on the cheap side? Yes. Trampling all over cherished highlights of great movie making? Right-o. Overuse of bodily functions? Check. Hitting below the belt? - Belt? Which belt?And it was some 90 minutes of the most immature fun i've had in years, mostly because this movie DARED to do all this. I've not seen something that high on the absurdity scale for a long, long time. Mind you, despite its total lack of dignity and/or cinematic integrity, glaring disregard for continuity etc., you need to have A LOT of references at hand at any given moment of the film. MTV, Chocolate factory, M:I, X-Men, DaVinci code, Pirates of the Caribbean, Narnia, Potter, cheap kung-fu movies ... all thrown into the blender, highest setting. Whoever wrote this, they've spent a lot of time inside a cinema over the last years.The storyline? Who you're kidding? If at all, i'd guess it had a design guideline, which maybe read something like that: "Didn't you hate that annoying talking beaver from Narnia? And that wheel thing from Pirates of the Caribbean! Didn't you wonder how all those Narnia hybrid creatures came to be? And don't get me started about that creepy Willy Wonka! Well, LET'S SHOW THEM how much we hated that! Hey, call that Star Wars fan group you mentioned, ask them if they want to be on screen ..." etc. etc.Would i recommend it? No way. Then again, the exceptionally bad reputation made me curious, Plan-9-curious. Not expecting anything, i went away amused. It may not be for everyone. You wouldn't want to show it to your parents. Or your kids, either. It may not even work for a second viewing. But, it worked for me, on that one day today, at that one viewing. And for a movie, that's good enough for me.

The worst movie I've ever seen ! Unfortunately I saw this film at the cinema with my little sister, I was 13 years old at the time. So horrible, we left before the end... It was a very painful experience. The worst part is that we were very young, and at that time we liked stupid films like "Scary Movie" for example, at least it was effective and funny for young people. "Big Movie" is never funny, not even a little. And to say that I gave money to this joke, that it is sad ... surely one of my biggest mistakes of youth.

reviews.review_title: If you want to see a funny movie see this!
reviews.content: This movie is like the funniest movie ever! I just came back from seeing it and even though it was like an hour and thirty minutes it was great. If you want to see a good movie go see this, Im telling you this is a laugh out loud movie. ^_^ Even though this movie does in fact make fun of Narnia, Harry Potter, Xmen, Pirates of the Caribbean and etc. its actuarially really funny and good. I am really a big fan of all these movies but even though they did make fun of it, it was f**** hilarious. But don't go if your one of these people who are so uptight and are upset that their making fun of great movies. Really its just a good funny joke. GO SEE IT YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED!!!!! ^_^ 9 OUT OF 10 FOR ME! ^_^

I can't believe they thought this movie was worth producing. It maybe the number 1 in box office, doesn't make it a good movie. Just a lot people who thought it was 21st Century's version of Airplane (type parody). Sorry, I think pop culture spoofing of other movies are generally good when its actually done with someone who actually has talent in writing funny things. That was simply a stupid filler movie with bits for 2007. With very few bits that were funny enough to smirk. I've seen TV original comedy movies, like example Men in White, being funnier than this train wreck of a movie. It could be just sign of me getting old, but only people generally laughing in theater was teenagers who properly haven't seen a decent comedy movie before.

reviews.review_title: The perfect example of why America's movie industry has gone to crap
reviews.content: Epic Movie? That's the biggest joke of this entire thing and, like the rest of the "jokes" in this movie, there's nothing funny about it.Epic Movie is an example of how Hollywood is just a corporate machine with no interest in producing artistic, though provoking, progressive movies anymore. The idea for this movie was clearly concocted in a marketing meeting with a bunch of fat execs who sat down one day with their big Starbucks coffees and Dunkin Doughnuts and came up with a movie idea that would hit all of their target markets, whilst ripping off any movie that has made money over the last yearYeah, Scary Movie did it, but at least it was funny, and was poking fun back at Hollywood by showing that movies designed by marketers were the real joke. I guess the marketing people didn't get that joke either.I mean what is going on in this world? Who read this script and thought it was a good idea? How did this movie ever get made? Who actually stumped up money to make this crap? I mean this movie is so dumb only George W. Bush would actually get it.

Yep it's awful. I knew we were in for some raunchy stuff, sophomoric humor, some T&A, but I didn't think it could be worse. It WAS! I wasn't really prepared for urine and vomit jokes. The 12 year olds giggled a lot. Language was mildish, but unnecessary.There were some funny bits, about five minutes total (love the portrayal of Jack Swallow(s), Fred Willard greatly icky as Also, Jennifer Coolidge awesome as the witch). Oh what they could have done with the material they had!Sorry to say I didn't read enough reviews before we took the whole fam damily. We did enjoy hot dogs and pop corn, so that's a plus.

Crying out loud! Just like 'Disaster Movie' and 'Date Movie,' this movie is poorly produced, with garbage humor so bad I actually turned off my t.v and yelled louder then when I got in a car wreck in 2014. I have nothing else to say then this movie is just utter garbage. -1/10, waste of time and money from renting at the redbox.

OK...I do not understand where people are coming from! This movie was comedy genius! The jokes, the gags, the OLD HARRY POTTER! Oh the hilarity! What I believe is that these jokes sailed over all of your heads! I mean, what could be funnier than making fun of movies we have already seen! I mean the Superman stunt, it was like they were in my head when they were writing that.I think all people should see this. As a matter of fact, buy it and show it to your kids, grandkids and great-grandkids. Can you say "Treasured Family Hierloom"? Cinematic Gold, breath of fresh air, and a spirit lifting comedy are just a few of numerous descriptions I have of this movie.Well I must take my leave, but I hope you will all reconsider and re-vote once you realize how genius this movie truly is.In the words of my dear friend Borat, I end my review all with one word, "...(pause).... NOT!" Disclaimer: It was very difficult to write this comment. I hope the majority of you are all quick enough of catch the sarcasm. If not, well you probably agree with the above comments anyway! HA HA!

reviews.review_title: Not worth my time and money...
reviews.content: Perhaps the worst movie I have ever seen. The characters were awful and the story line even worse. It was all in all a pointless movie, there was no plot at all what-so-ever. The movie made no sense at all. Where did everybody go near the end? The whole film looked like amateur junior high schoolers made it. Scary Movies are by far a million times better. I thought Epic Movie would be at least "alright" so I could laugh at a few scenes, but it fell extremely short of that. I might have forced one laugh out once when The White Bitch couldn't get out of the sleigh, but that's about it. IT WAS AN ABSOLUTE LET DOWN.

Now i'm giving this a 5 because I saw this with a group of friends and it made it more fun, but if i saw this by myself, I wouldn't of given it a 5. It's not that good but I did laugh a couple times. This film definitely isn't to be taken seriously. It's good hearted fun and seeing with friends makes it even better. Don't expect a hysterical unique movie but go expecting to laugh and have fun in the process. At first i thought this movie was to be terrible, but it wasn't as bad as I thought. Epic Movie is better than Date Move, but not as good as the Scary Movie series. All I'm gonna say is that if you want to enjoy this movie, see with friends, it makes the ride more fun and enjoyable. 5/10

reviews.review_title: A slight improvement on "Date Movie," but the directors have a VERY LONG way to go.
reviews.content: *REVEALS SPOILERS TO BOTH "EPIC" AND "DATE" MOVIES"*I saw it with my younger brother. We laugh at just about anything. But for this "movie" spoof, we rarely laughed at all. Sure we thought Kal Penn with top-billing would be a nice touch. But it's only a touched, Because the real star is the idiotic Adam Campbell with second billing. He not only has more scenes then Kal Penn, but the story revolves Campbell because he's the leader. Not helping either are the two female leads who I've never heard of and probably won't remember. "Date Movie" was far much worse, starting with opening credits of a fat chick dancing to a lame song. At least there were no opening credits to have the audience sit in agony. Plus it's a spoof on romantic comedies only your parents have seen. Are we supposed to be entertained by movies that came out so many years ago? Like with the "Lord of the Rings" joke for instance. Which wasn't funny. The saga ended in 2003 and we see this film in 2006. Don't these film-makers have any sense of cultural relevance? In this new spoof of very recent Hollywood blockbusters, the only highlights are a training montage at Hogwarts, Carmen Electra as Mystique, and Crispin Glover as a rightfully creepy Wonka. That's it! No other laughs, no coherent storyline, No climax, no clever dialogue, no decent acting. No funIf I could give career advice to these two directors it would be two pages long. But I guess I'll have to condense it into one paragraph. 2 of the 6 writers of "Scary Movie." If you want your future films to be funny here's what you do. Remove fat jokes because they aren't funny, avoid cheesy celebrity impressions from semi look-alikes. Put in some more flashy special effects and not ones stolen from other films. Negotiate a few big stars to be in the lead. Minimize dance and rap moves. They only work in concerts. And above all, try screening your films to tests audiences. That way you know what works and what doesn't. Nows your chance to emulate the Wayans brothers since they've recently made bad films. I suggest you take that rare opportunity. And I hope you the viewers and the film-makers will find this information useful.

What a comedy! Epic Movie should be renamed Epic PARODIES! LMBO If only it had elements from Austin Powers, Star Wars, Fantastic Four, SpiderMan, Just Like heaven and especially Step Up. Oh man! This is the bomb. It held #1 at the box office and tragically beaten by Norbit. I'm sure a similar movie, Wrongfully Accused, has the same elements. My favorite was Lucy, the skinny redhead. I like Eddie, the Hispanic one, he's adorable. As for the White Witch (rather than B****), you can't nullify any type of prophecy like it's some kind of fairy tale. Because Prophecies are inevitable, ancient and like happen quini-centrally. LOL Or is there no such thing as quinti-centrally, millennial or timelessly?! ROFL

reviews.review_title: Take out every single one of the Scary Movies' flaws, throw them into a movie, and Epic Movie is what you get.
reviews.content: I didn't believe a comedy could be this bad until I saw this movie. I didn't know a comedy could fail on almost every level until I saw this movie. Honestly, it's the equivalent of watching little school children repeat silly fart jokes they've just heard; only you're watching it on the big screen.I've tried to like this film and see past its countless faults, but it's so bad it's impossible to even be a guilty pleasure. Even if the plot was even slightly comprehensible, the actors don't seem to know what they're doing, or where they are, or even why they've allowed themselves to appear in such shameful trash.There is no humour in Epic Movie; the "2 out of 6 writers from Scary Movie" just rely on mind-blowingly stupid, pathetic parodies to "entertain us", which are nothing like the parodies in the Scary Movie franchise. Those were actually funny. It's like they've taken the most extremely straight-forward, obvious aspects from well-known movies, added an unprecedented level of stupid childish homophobic potty humour and tried to make us laugh by showing the characters from Narnia, The Davinci Code and Charlie and the Chocolate Factor dancing to hip-hop music.When you can't even successfully parody something that actually deserved to be made, THAT's when you have a problem.3/10. Trust me, I'm being nice.

reviews.review_title: Don't go to see this movie!
reviews.content: This movie was not only extremely disappointing, but it is one of the worst movies I have ever seen. I was expecting it to be like the Scary Movies (which I find hilarious) but it was dull and unoriginal. In addition, it took innocent movies such as Narnia and Willy Wonka and turned them into twisted, perverted tales. I found it disturbing, and I am nearly positive that it would disturb any children that happened to see it.So, even if you want to see it, DON'T TAKE THE KIDS!!!! There were only a few parts where I laughed, but even then it was stuff I had seen before. This movie was truly bad.

This movie was so awful, and not even close to "epic". The movie had like no funny things in it and anything that was even close to remotely funny was shown in the trailers and by the time we saw the movie we already knew the jokes and it wasn't funny. besides the animation sucked and some of the jokes were not at all funny, some of them looked as if they were just thrown in there to make the movie longer, for example the borate thing at the end of the movie what was that?, another example is the superman thing with peter, and what is up with the chicken wings, thats just idiotic. i mean i can not believe that this movie was made by two of the people who made scary movie i mean those movies are cool but this one sucked.

Expect nothing and get nothing, that's exactly what followed this tear jerking movie. I say tear jerking because I almost cried over the thought that our movie industry would resort to putting something that awful out in theaters. Understanding that there have been some good movies that came out recently, but dropping the bomb on this movie will make the next comedy I see, no matter how bad seem like a 10 out of 10. If your thinking about going out to watch this movie because you don't have anything better to do, than just have nothing better to do and save your money. Yet, on another hand go and watch this movie, because I want you to feel as miserable as I did, pain, suffering, wretchedness, feeling like kicking my own ass for wasting and hour of my already nothing to do life, crying out to my friend begging him to leave because he drove kind of miserable. Pure misery.

reviews.review_title: the worst movie I have ever seen. I don't believe it wouldn't let me rate it below a 1
reviews.content: I have two words to summarize this: absolutely disgusting. If one likes very bad toilet humor and just strange sex humor you might just giggle. When upon seeing this, i thought since the previews' were okay, I thought it would be better. I was completely wrong when I made this judgment. I didn't even dare to see Little Man, but that was probably better. Throughout I wasn't laughing, nor was I looking. I really did almost fall asleep at this crap. The time taken to make this film was absolutely wasted and dead. toilet humor such as writing their names with urine and seeing a copy of willy - wonka taking some one's balls out is just a very strange sight. There was one part i did giggle at and that was when the copy of willy - wonka was dancing to fergilicous. Please, whomever you may be, a rich person or a hobo, i beg of you do not see Epic movie. There is nothing epic about it. Not even the smallest child that thinks toilets and farting is funny would enjoy this film and to see it waste people's money and time and to even be allowed in a theater is a crime against human rights.

I've watched some pretty awful movies but this one is unwatchable. I could only get through the first half hour and then I had to turn it off. The jokes were painfully unfunny to the point where I think the writes must have been trying to make the worst comedy they could. I can't believe they found enough people to dedicate time to make the movie or even people to fund it. The only way this movie could have been worse is if it included Carrot Top, Paulie Shore, and Ben Affleck in the staring roles, but then I think I would of had to lobotomize myself to forget the horror my eyes would had endured. If you haven't seen any portion of this movie, I sincerely envy you. No one should have to endure the total crappyness of this turd.

reviews.review_title: NO! Just don't go near this! Just don't!
reviews.content: Im afraid to say that this film is the worst i've seen for years, its poorly acted with too many stupid jokes and unnecessary swearing, that just leaves you with the general sarcastic "ha ha, not funny" feeling. Well i must admit that some of the jokes did give my mates and i the occasional giggle, but the whole way through i just felt embarrassed to be seen watching this sort of crap! As a pretty average 15 year old, i found this film just stupid and silly, i paid a fiver of my money for this movie, and by the end, sitting at home with my cat, watching it assault its tail, was much more amusing! The actual quality of which this is filmed is appalling for a 21st century movie. I could have filmed this in my back garden for that matter! The stunts are so tacky and fake, and at one point it was blatantly obvious that they were using dummies to depict a fight scene. OK well maybe that was one of the jokes... well that was absolutely hilarious.They say that this film was made from two of the writers of scary movie. Well that explains a lot. Scary movie itself was a hilarious film, with so many laughs and hilarious gags, but not great, and with the writers who probably let down scary movie in the first place, they let down this.Thinking about it this movie had a chance, but that chance was ruined, my advice is to watch this only to see a really bad film!

There is honestly a special place in my heart for this movie. I understand that people hate (not even strong enough of a word, how about loathe, or despise?) it because of its bad acting and script quality (not to mention the tasteless humor), but I happen to like it, maybe even love it. I'll explain the best I can. I saw this movie when i was younger in the theaters, and i was with many of my mischievous friends. We were in that stage when being the biggest menace to society and crude as possible was cool and fun. We sat down and watched this movie in the theater, and laughed our butts off. Wanna know why? Because we were kids who didn't care about the "plot" or anything like that. We just wanted to laugh and have a good time. And the crude jokes just made that easier for us. We didn't expect to see some "work of art" or something like that, we expected to see a batch of crude jokes and stupid spoofs of movies we have seen. I guess you can call it immaturity. But thats what you need to enjoy this movie. Any person can realize just through the trailer that this movie is going to be obnoxious, so you don't need to expect some "work of art". Instead, see it with your friends, enjoy the crude jokes, and chill out with all of the preppy critic stuff.

reviews.review_title: If you plan to waste your time; this is definitely the film to watch
reviews.content: Right, perhaps this is the 1st time in my life I decided to post a review about a film 'cause this is SO awful that the film makers must be kidding us.I fully understand that people enjoy reading things while in the toilet and some Hollywood script writers adopt the same policy, BUT this movie just goes beyond...I really want to know WHO financed this film and most importantly WHY, as I honestly do not understand the very reason of its existence!This film is supposed to be a parody of other films but in fact it is a parody itself. I managed to see 1/4 of the movie and WOULD NOT recommend it to my worst enemy!A friendly advise to those planning to see this film: a) If you ll have to pay to see it **STOP** it should be the other way around.b) If you were given this film as a present, return it to the vendor and try swapping it over to a decent film that actually Does not insult your intelligence.c) Do NOT let your children watch this crap; it serves no purpose what so ever

I haven't seen this film for a long time but when I did, I found it funny even though most people don't seem to. This film references a lot of different movies so it is good that it manages to include references to that many films. Most people seem to hate this film but I like it though.

The whole theater was quiet...maybe maybe a lil chuckle here or there but save your $$$$$$. I don't even think I would recommend for video. There is nothing funny about this movie. Typical annoying characters with typical bikini chicks, bad writing...you know exactly what is coming next. This movie tried way to hard to be funny. At the end of the movie everyone in the theater yelled BOO,. The whole movie is based on the characters in the Chronicals of Nadia. Just to gill you all in on how annoying it is one of the characters copy's everything another character says. Cant figure out why anyone would invest money into filming this. This is the first time I have written a review, it was so bad I felt compelled too.

After seeing the commercials for days on end I decided to rent this with a lot of eagerness to see it. After about 10 min, I was wishing I hadn't wasted the $2.00... It wasn't very funny, clever, or witty like they had hoped I think. The writers tried way too hard on this, with little result of any humor. But it was OK. Nothing more. Would I watch it again? Umm, no. But it did entertain me a tiny bit for a little while. So to everyone out there thinking this is going to be a fantastically hilarious movie, think again. Its wayyyy over top with the potty humor, ridiculous really. Maybe if they were writing a script for a junior high play this would be fine but for an actual movie, uh uh, just didn't fly.

There are only two good things I can say about this movie:a.) I managed to get through the whole thing b.) I just saw the first ten minutes of the movie "Postal", and turned it off, making it, and not this, the worst movie I've (n)ever seen.I had to watch this movie in two sittings because I'd had my share of gross by the time it got to the part where Lucy's tongue got ripped out of her mouth and turned it off, but as I said, I did see the whole thing. I don't know what I can say that nobody else has said about this rancid stream of garbage juice, but I'll try. It was tasteless, unoriginal and just outright BAD! The script was horrible, the jokes were overused and not funny in any way, and the climax (the defeat of the White Bitch and her army, along with the supposedly funny ending)...well, talk about anti-climax! "Date Movie" was another one that I had to watch in bits and pieces because of the gross-out factor, but even that was better than this (and considering that it too was a Friedberg/Seltzer movie, that's hard to do). DO NOT SEE THIS MOVIE!! I am not using reverse psychology; I am asking you to save your curiosity to see a more worthwhile film than this puddle of street sludge.

epic movies plot as everyone knows is about spoofing you guessed it epic movies like harry potter and the DA vinci code i have to say this was probley the worst spoof movie I've ever seen but I'm giving it points for effort i know about all the bashing of this film but it is not the worst movie ever there are far worse movies A.K.A batman and robin i will start off with the good things i liked kal Penn in this he played the jerk the humor sometimes hit like the snakes on a plane spoof was funny and the jack black look a like was funny and the girl who played Lucy was priceless and Carmen Electra was good in this the soundtrack was great such as Willy wonka dancing to fergie now to the bads i feel Jenifer Coolidge was a miscast she just didn't feel right she acted good but it just didn't fit and the Hermione zit joke i don't know what there interest in zits popping came from but no one was laughing its just disgusting and the clear stunt double jokes were just boring Fred Willard was also a miscast and also the long periods of boring jokes so after this movie i saw meet the Spartans and loved it but this one should be somewhat forgotten

This movie should of had a refund policy if you weren't satisfied.I thought Super Troopers was the worst movie I had seen to date,but this movie is just as horrible.I would of rather had my chest waxed (see 40 year old Virgin) then sit through this garbage.The only part I liked slightly was the beaver.Bad actors,bad jokes,bad script equals BAD MOOD.To my defense I was drugged and put into my friends trunk and knowing what I know now I wish they would have left me in the trunk until the movie was over.I could tell by the previews that this movie would suck.What was with all the rapping?Was this made by the Wayan Brothers because it sucked as bad as one of their movies.I'm just wondering who was the idiot who paid to make this turd.The one good thing about turds is that you can flush them down the toilet and this is where Epic Movie finds it's place.

reviews.review_title: Minus 9 out 10 would be the accurate vote to give this.
reviews.content: I'm truly ashamed to even give this 1 out of 10. I'm ashamed I even bothered to comment on this movie. Finally someone manages to make the worst movie I've EVER seen. I know it's a easy thing to say, but finally it is true. There is not ONE funny person, scene or moment in this movie. I give it minus 9 and not minus 10 because of some naked girls..(yup, it was the only highlight in this dark dark matter of film) How can something THIS bad get made? How do they manage to finish making it? How did I manage to make it through the whole movie? The only reason why I didn't fall asleep must be because I'm just so curious to see how a movie can come through THIS BAD? A Night At The Museum was close to truly an amazingly bad movie. Still, even there I think at least I almost smiled once. In this movie I just got more and more curious about how more than one person could agree to put this on film(!?).All anyone can say about this film is DON'T WATCH IT!! This IS the worst movie I've ever seen in my 29 years on this earth. It's not funny to watch to laugh at how bad it is either...it's just HORRIBLE.
