And the "summer blockbuster" type of movie is ripe for parody. Epic Movie doesn't even bother to poke fun at some of the obvious excesses of the genre. Instead, they take characters and concepts from some of the major movies of the last several years, most notably Chronicles of Narnia,put them in some lame and generic gags, most which deal with urination and goofy dancing, and offer only half hearted jabs at the movies they parody. For example, instead of poking fun at Nacho Libre for the obviously Anglo Jack Black attempting to be a Latino, they just have one of the kids beat up one of the main characters. It's not funny, not good parody and annoying as heck.Please, save your money. Trust me. If you go see this movie, you'll wish you did.

I have reviewed movies on IMDb.com for years, but I must say that this is the first time I have written a review myself. I cannot say that this is the worst movie I have seen, but is is up there, or should I say down there. As bad as Stealth was, it still was a lot better than this piece of garbage. It wouldn't even be so bad if I at least laughed once. How do you make a movie that is advertised as a comedy and you don't even laugh one time? I only watched this movie because I was wasting time and the movies that I wanted to see were not playing ad the movies I would have settled on were not playing at the time available to me. Needless to say, I seen this garbage and now I am compelled to warn others!! Don't even rent the DVD. In fact, if someone gives you the free DVD of this movie, spit on it and walk away. You have been warned!!!!

reviews.review_title: If you semi-enjoyed epic movie you are the problem in this country
reviews.content: I'm sorry usually I don't like writing bad reviews but this movie has p****d me off so much that I cant keep quiet. Let me start by saying that I was forced by my nut case of an ex-girlfriend to see this waste of film. It amazes me that movies like this piece of garbage get more recognition than actual movies like City of God and Amorres Perros. What drives me insane is that people were actually retarded enough to PAY MONEY and waste time watching this 1 hour and 8 minute long piece of crap which could have been spent more productively staring at a blank wall or slamming your hand with a car door.Seriously to know that this movie was #1 in the box office and raked 19 MILLION dollars opening weekend made me die inside and made me lose hope in America. How could anybody even be compelled to watch this movie? "Gee let me go waste 1 hour and 8 minutes of my life and 7 bucks to watch this s**t fest." If you found this funny it is because your brain is the size of a peanut and you need to be locked away because you are a danger to a rational society. I'm disappointed in every actor or person in this movie. Im angry for all those great undiscovered writers and directors around the world that work hard dreaming of finally releasing a movie that 1,000 people might see and then watch as this movie rakes in more money than some Oscar nominated movies. Even watching the trailers made me feel dumber. "Ha ha ha a Paris Hilton joke ha ha ha let me go swallow a fork." Seriously America disappointed me and the we're in bad shape if movies like this continue to succeed.

reviews.review_title: Is This Really What Our World Is Turning Into?
reviews.content: What has become of this world? The mere fact that this movie was made is repulsive. You can no longer go see a good movie or turn on a TV show without having it infested with profanity, violence, and/or sexuality. Is this really how we want future generations to remember us? What's worse is that the commercials portray it as a good, fairly clean movie, maybe not an award winner, but a movie you could see on a Friday night and actually enjoy. I went to see it expecting a good laugh and all I got, for most of the movie, were girls who were wearing clothes that barely covered them, if they were wearing anything at all, and men who gave the image that these girls were doing things that they liked. While some people may enjoy this, a far majority of the population does not find girls who display themselves in revealing ways appealing. So, if you have the urge to see this movie, you can get the same experience in your own house, without paying 10 bucks. Go sit down in front of the TV and watch crappy music videos for an hour and 28 minutes. Enjoy!

reviews.review_title: These scriptwriters and the director really need to find another job
reviews.content: I don't usually write reviews but I had to simply comment on this. To watch this movie is to encourage those who wrote it and frankly anyone associated with this movie should go and find themselves another job because script writing and comedy definitely isn't it. I really did try hard to like it as I encouraged a friend to watch it with me on Sky Movies but the movie just totally and utterly fails to deliver even one laugh. In the end we stuck out about 30 minutes and then gave up. I will avoid all future films by this director and script writer - this was the biggest waste of money and time I've ever had the misfortune of sitting through. Possibly the only reason to watch this would be to see just how badly a movie can be made -otherwise avoid.

This movie is pure crap. Crap crap crap.It could have been good. There are several good movies to parody, including those in this movie, but it looks like it was made in one day from concept to finished product.Don't waste your time or money. Don't even see it on DVD. Believe me, everything that was remotely funny was in the trailer.In conclusion, this movie is an F minus and a waste of....everything.It's hard to find enough bad things to say about this movie so that I can meet the length requirements. The script lacks substance....it's so empty. It could have been so good. I wanted to go in and have a great time, but I couldn't because it just wasn't funny.

Wow....I'm speechless. When I first saw Epic Movie's poster, I thought I was in for a couple of good laughs. Boy was I wrong. The acting was freaking awful especially the Snakes on a plane scene. Which I'm not going to spoil. And another thing that should be made an important point. IT WASN'T FUNNY AT ALL. Actually, only the "Punk'd" parody made me chuckle while the rest of the movie made me cringe.Now I don't want you to think I'm just another guy on the hate bandwagon. You may like this movie if you liked Date Movie but you are going to probably be disappointed. If you really wanna see this piece of crap then I can't stop you. I'm just warning you.

reviews.review_title: epic movie, excellent flick, very funny
reviews.content: some of these movies that spoof originals are not funny nor entertaining. surprisingly this was actually quite funny. don't listen to those 1 star reviewers, they don't know what they are talking about. they don't have souls inside of them, no heart...loved this movie cause it contains cast/plots from my favorite childhood movie - the lion, the witch, and the wardrobe that was released on VHS and beta back in early 80s.the movie starts out with showing the 4 main characters and how they get back together, then go on a journey to narnia. to see the evil white witch indeed is the plot.

OK just before peter and the guys fight the white bitches army they are all standing there looking cool. Alright if you look closely when they are approaching there is a price tag stem out of the neck mesh on peter. Its only there for a moment but it is such a big mistake that they didn't realize when the movie was being put together. If they did it was a good goof for this movie. But in the theater no one around me noticed it which is odd. But watch it carefully at that point in time and you will see the little piece of plastic that goes through the price tag. So this movie was great it wasn't as funny as i thought it would be but that little part just made my night.

I went to this movie not really knowing what it was about. I had seen trailers, but honestly I forgot all about it. So in other words, I had a totally open mind about it with no opinions either way. At first, I thought it was pretty funny. The first few scenes were well put together and well thought out. The second the "children" stepped into "Gnarnia", it all went downhill from there. First of all, Narnia was a perfectly good movie. You need to make fun of a stupid film if you are going to spoof it. Secondly, this offends many people that are Christians because Aslan represents God, and he is a drunk pimp in the movie. I know Hollywood probably doesn't care, but I don't think its a great idea to offend a large percent of the people who see the movie. So to sum it all up, I would sit this one out if you haven't already had the "privledge" of seeing it.

reviews.review_title: Oh My Gosh!! the best movie EVER!!
reviews.content: such a super funny movie!! i saw it with 7 of my friends today,and we were laughing the whole time..References to any other movies were quickly noted, and we were all able to tell which movies they were from..And, the fact that they used the word "kinky"at one part, amused us all because one of my friends happens to enjoy using the word..And the fact that they mentioned a "Doctor Phill" moment amused us as well, because we have all taken on names of some talk show hosts, and one of my friends (who uses the word 'kinky'), has taken on the name of "Dr.Phill." This movie was put together very well, and I would love to see it again.. My friends and I think that there should be other "Epic Movies," to follow this one... YAY Epic Movie!! =]

Well, lets say it was no American pie.There are very few things about this movie, actually, the only thing that I laughed at was when then were making references to Kumar, at white castle, and stifler's mom. Those little jokes were the only laughs I got through the whole thing...WHy did I give this movie an 8? CARMEN ELECTRA, even as an all blue X-men character, she was still the hottest thing I have ever seen.So go see the movie, Its not boring, and its not that funny, but I personally think it is still worth your time.This is my sole opinion, I went and saw it with a kid who probably thought it was one of the funnyest movies he has ever seen. So who knows, you may think it is hilareous

I thought the movie was better then the previews portrayed it. I couldn't stop laughing throughout the whole movie. The whole theater was filled with laughter the first hour. I found all the comparisons to other movies hilarious. The pirate rap was, GREAT. The pirate looked and sounded just like johnny dep from the movie. I mean it had some dumb parts, but overall it was a great movie, way better then date movie. I think some people took the movie to seriously and didn't find it amusing at all. But all the movies they used to make fun of, i had seen and thats what was funny. Just how well they portrayed each scene and character from the original movie it was just so hilarious. The lines they used were great and some were so corny you just had to laugh at the stupidness.

reviews.review_title: whatever you do, do NOT ever ever see this movie!
reviews.content: when me and my boyfriend decided to go to the cinema for valentines day the film we were originally going to see unfortunately was sold out and so we had to see epic movie instead, i had seen the trailer and didn't think it was that bad.....oh how very very wrong i was! nothing in this film was funny, entertaining, or original. to be honest the only reason we stayed for the whole film was because we had paid some ridiculous amount of money to watch it. mind you it was only an hour long! There was no plot whatsoever and some part, such as the take on cribs, were just far to painful.this was a waste of my time and any fool who gives it more than a one star rating is either of incredibly low intellect and amused by extensive BAD toilet humour or was asleep.

The Movie "Epic Movie included a lot of funny scenes, but the problem was that it was made poorly. On some parts, you could see the other person take place in their figure spot, and other times it was just plain ridiculous. This movie would be great for people who like to have a laugh, but I don't recommend this to older people 30 plus, because you might find this "horrible".They did do a good job showing other movies taking place in one. Scenes went so fast, that you wished went longer.The Harry potter part was bad, and I think they should have either made it longer, or "cut it out." A very funny part would have to be the cribs part, punked, and the White bitch on the laptop, on her Myspace. Besides that, there were a few laughs, and I guess you could say it was Worth seeing...kind of.

reviews.review_title: its not as bad as people say(watch the unrated version)
reviews.content: I think people don't like this because they set their expectations too high. it will make you laugh but its not as good as scary movie. if you want to see a really bad spoof than watch disaster movie, but this is pretty funny. some jokes were obvious. this probably wasn't that hard to write up, but it'll make you laugh. all in all a good spoof. not "airplane" good , butt better than disaster movie. i give this an eight out of ten. so if your gonna buy it buy the uncut because the theatrical is not nearly as good in any way shape or form. so, um watch this! um... yeah... well the only thing wrong with this movie is the faun that gives tongue kisses to the gay beaver. ***of**** the end.

reviews.review_title: Woeful attempt at humour, lacking any substance or flair, the film is on a world of it's own
reviews.content: To me, you can always tell from the start if a film is worth watching or not. In my mind, if the films slogan is 'We know it's big. We measured', you can almost certainly conclude that its probably a film to miss. I was right. Anyone above the age of 14 can come to an instant deduction that it is a terrible film. The 'plot' jumps around, following a group of high school children, who embark on a supposedly epic quest, making parodies of various other films along the way. However, after the first 20 minutes or so, it becomes all to clear that the film relies heavily on the frequent use of crude toilet humour, and persistent references to feces. I am all to sure that a pack of 12 year olds will think that the height of all wit has been reached in this film, and would have spent majority of the time watching the film, rolling on the floor, giggling away at the references to the male genitalia, and laughing out loud at the abundance of slapstick humour that features throughout. Luckily, the people who will 'love' this film, (children aged 8-12) are those that feel you are incapable of stringing an amusing sentence together, without unleashing one of their newly discovered swear words, or making some sort vulgar reference to fart jokes. It makes me somewhat scared that if the latest crop of 8-12 year olds are so captivated by swearing and any form of slapstick and toilet humour, they fail to think of anything original and funny themselves. Is that really what the future holds for comedy? All jokes making some sort of allusion to excrement. I think you can probably guess by the 'two star' rating that this is a film to miss. It, I know, it is a generous rating, but, though ashamed to admit it, I did laugh twice, partially fulfilling it's role as a 'comedy'. At least now 'HMV' will know which genre to place it under, making the film all to easy to find for those 12 year olds, so eager to grasp hold a copy of possibly the worst film of the year. E.S

reviews.review_title: Epic Movie is an Epic Stinker
reviews.content: I went to see Epic Movie, hoping to get a good laugh out of it with all the epic films it was spoofing. Yet I was in for a huge disappointment. I was suppose to have fun watching this movie, but the movie was not of any fun at all. The acting was unbelievably horrible, the script was very unoriginal and uncreative, the plot was just downright stupid, the characters were very uninteresting, the spoofing was more like plagiarizing, and worst of all the jokes were not at all funny. The movie as a whole was very boring and dull. Epic Movie is, without a doubt, the worst movie ever.I'm a guy who will like pretty much anything, and even I think this movie sucks.If there's any movie of 2007 that deserves a Razzie for Worst Picture, Epic Movie would be it.

reviews.review_title: It's so bad that you should see it.(Maybe that was the point !!!)
reviews.content: Holy Cr*p!I have never seen such "thing" in my life. It's so bad that it hurts. I wonder what on earth made these actors to accept this kind of self-humiliation. Money...? I don't know, but for sure I've seen them in much better movies. I have to admit they've created something unique. The worst movie ever.It's 2007 people!!!!We are supposed to evolve mentally but this kind of entertainment doesn't help at all!!!1/10

I can't say how bad this movie is. Like someone else, I wished for a negative score for this movie. Date movie wasn't the best in the world, but it looked like it should have been nominated for an Oscar compared to this drivel. I am normally a fan of parodies, so I was incredibly interested to see this movie especially when there were 2 Johnny Depp parodies. (I love him.) Crispen Glover made an interested choice for Willie Wonka, but interesting does not make a great film. The premise was trite and overwrought. The jokes meant to be funny weren't. I would definitely like to get that time of my life back and do something entertaining like, oh, getting a root canal. Save your money and your time! Epic is an epic disaster.

Wow this movie sucked. All the other movies. Like date movie and the Scary Movie series were so much better than this. It was only an hour and 15 minutes long, to short to my standings. I just wish this movie was a little bit better. Well me and my husband wasted 16.50 to see this movie. It could have been done a whole lot better. I thought this movie was suppose to be funny. There was no one laughing in the theater when we saw it. I'd just wait to see it when it comes to HBO or Cinemax or Starz, which ever company it is going to go to. Harrold and Kumar go to white castle was better than this movie. Again I just wish this movie would of done better. The only reason why people would go see it is just cause of the Actors and Actresses in it. So I suggest to wait till it comes to cable to see this movie!

Don't go by the ratings or some awful comments. The movie is good.If you have like the Scary Movie Series or the Date Movie, watch this movie. Its good.I think people didn't like this movie because they felt that there favorite movies or actors were being made fun of. The movie is meant for that like every other movie of its kind. So, for those who have rated it poorly, get a sense of humor.All the four main characters of the movie are good. Kal Penn is very good. This movie (I felt) was good for passing time. Its funny & light. When your bored, watch this movie on your DVD.Mohit

Go see it and you'll laugh the whole time, some of the movies they make fun of are older but it's just hilarious. The comment above me is obviously from someone who does not understand movies. Go ahead and check it out.Most of the time during the movie you could not stop laughing especially when they did the mtv cribs at narnia. The most disturbing comment is what the person said above about coming suicide, LoL obviously someone with a lot of emotional problems. Go see a doc you psycho,Hopefully they can make a part 2

Scary Movie 4 was actually quite enjoyable; my friend and I genuinely laughed a dozen or so times. So upon seeing the preview for Epic Movie I thought, why not? I honestly don't know who green lighted this? Then again, I guess it's been in the number one position for quite some time now so I guess the producers are thrilled. However, they have finally and forever turned me off paying good money to go and see one of these spoofs. It was dreadful. I think I laughed once! And I am NOT hard to please when it comes to movies. I generally watch any old garbage and take something from it. BE WARNED. Waste your money on this at your own peril!

This was absolutely terrible. It's saving grace was that it barely lasted over an hour. We got into the movie ten minutes late, at 9:25, and walked out when the credits rolled at 10:24. Half of the jokes were ripped off from Austin Powers and MTV reality shows (Cribs, PUNKD) and the "parodies" weren't funny at all. Wow, the beaver's name is Harry Beaver, and he makes out with a faun. What a waste of time. That's an hour of my life I'll never get back. I want my $8 back. The movie also relied heavily on the fact that Kal Penn was in White Castle with the guy from American Pie. They actually show White Castle, which is where the White Bitch lives. Coincidentally, the White Bitch was played by the chick who played Stiffler's Mom. And when Penn sees her for the first time, surprise surprise, he goes, "Whoa, Stiffler's Mom." Someone needs to beat up the idiots that made this disgrace to cinema everywhere

I saw this with ma friend and we couldn't stop laughing. It was hilarious and I have been waiting forever to buy it!!! It was awesome and I would have seen it over and over again at the movies. I am so gonna go out and buy it ASAP. The whole movie was funny and I thoroughly enjoyed it. Oh my gosh it's so damn hard to write 10 lines about this movie... I loved it and I give it a ten out of ten!! I would recommend this movie to people that are allowed movies with a bit of swearing in it. There is just so much that made me and my friend laugh hard. Our stomachs went sore because we were laughing so hard :P If you haven't seen it go rent it or even buy it and I don't see what people don't like about it!?!? Well i'm going to buy it soon. I have waited forever and ever and now it's finally out. If they made an xbox game on it I would be one of the first to buy it.amelia xoxo

If somebody presents you with a copy of this film, may I suggest that you throw it in the bin straight away. This film is absolutely dreadful with poor acting, poor sense of humour which are just not funny whatsoever and a pathetic attempt to make it a parody from other films. I honestly do not know why these kind of films are still being made today, (Scary Movie 5 etc.) there are so many aspiring film makers out there (myself included) that are being denied or restricted the opportunity to show off their true potential skill and knowledge in film making when crap films made by crap directors and producers like this so called 'comedy' are being made today. Now don't get me wrong, I do have a sense of humour and I enjoy watching comedy films now and again, just not the ones as badly made as this one. Even when I was made to go and watch this film at the cinema when I was 13 years old I still didn't find it funny or humorous at all. If you're a normal human being with a sense of humour, even if it's vague, watch something else other than this pathetic excuse of a film. However, if your idea of a sense of humour is tying a cat to a ceiling fan and watch it being hurled around the room for your amusement, then this is the film for you. Enjoy it and hopefully I'll never meet or work with people like you.

Thoroughly slated in several reviews, I knew this wasn't going to be Shakespeare. I think they were looking for highbrow eloquence and thespian cadences. I can only suggest it is supposed to be a satire on everything from Bond to Star Wars. Not surprisingly the plot is more an excuse for linking unlikely elements than a coherent storyline. Think Blazing Saddles and Airplane and stop looking for logic. I think they enjoyed making it, I enjoyed watching it. What's not to like? Crude jokes and puerile gags are there to be laughed or groaned at. If you can't see the funny side, you probably have your head stuck up where it shouldn't be.

hmm.... what can I say about 'Epic Movie'? Imagine going to a concert and seeing a band you've never heard before. They start out by covering some CRAPPY songs by other unimpressive bands... but you decide to give them a chance....surely, its bound to improve right? surely the entire concert can't be covers of crappy songs? The above scenario does not fully describe the atrocity that is 'Epic Movie'. Imagine that same concert, except every NOTE to each song is out of tune... Imagine how you would feel if not one single note of one crappy song was played in tune, or with any type of coherency for that matter? That about nails this movie on the head. I won't bother summarizing the plot, because, as you no doubt have guessed, there is none. This movie is a collection of crappy actors, spoofing crappy (for the most part) movies for an hour and twenty minutes.... EVERY SINGLE JOKE falls flat on its face... the few laughs me and my buddies had (we downloaded the movie and watched it on our big screen via an extension cable) came from thoughts of "how could this possibly make it to theaters? who OK'd this material?" I suddenly felt an intense desire to meet the man that said "yea, thats good, lets put that in the movie" to all of the garbage i witnessed.There are wild inconsistencies. People are decapitated, thrown off airplanes, castrated, yet... fine in the next scene. While I realize this is intended (it must be, although such carelessness wouldn't surprise me considering how poorly this movie was put together), it was just plain dumb... not funny 'Epic Movie' intrigued me because I thought it mite be one of those "funny because its terrible" movies.... but it wasn't... it was simply a terrible movie that wasn't the least bit funny.When I saw 'Epic Movie' was number one at the box office, what should have been a sense of disbelief that came over me was replaced by a sense of acceptance. When you all sit around with your friends, and say "we could write a movie better than this"... you are right... and i don't even know you... but ide bet the lives of my family you could do it As an American I feel slightly embarrassed this movie topped our charts even for a week or so, but if Bush is President, should i really be embarrassed by this 'epic' catastrophe? probably not save your time, your money, your sanity, and your life by not seeing this movie if you already saw it in the theater... well... its alright, it happens to everyone once in awhile... the best thing is to just not think about it and move on worse than battlefield earth. and i thought that wasn't possible

I was very reluctant to watch Epic Movie. Quite contrary to how excited I'd been to see Date Movie, featuring my favorite actress, Alyson Hannigan, but even she could not save that movie. Date Movie was an atrocious film that is a disgrace to spoof movies everywhere, so, naturally, I wasn't expecting much out of Epic Movie.I was pleasantly surprised.While it is nowhere near the level of some of the great spoofs of the last 3 decades (Airplane!, Wrongfully Accused, Mafia, Hot Shots, Scary Movie, etc.), Epic Movie certainly has it's moments.Though it contains a lot of the unfunny, ridiculous drivel that is apparently a feeble attempt at spoofing that we saw in the last film, it has quite a few worthwhile, funny moments.It starts off quite unfunny, but don't give up on it too early! It does go somewhere, and the film really gains steam as it progresses.The highlight of the film is Darrell Hammond's GENIUS spot-on parody of Captain Jack Sparrow from the Pirates of the Caribbean. He truly does a masterful job spoofing the character.Please note that you will have to be sitting through the numerous spontaneous hip-hop numbers that appear in Date Movie, but they're mercifully few and far-between.Over all, I'd give Epic Movie a 6, purely for it's spirit, and Aaron Seltzer and Jason Friedberg's drastic improvement in quality from the last film.I'd say that the next one might actually be a decent comedy film.

reviews.review_title: the worst thing i have ever seen....
reviews.content: why? this is less a movie, more a film crew trying to spoof every movie ever made, epic movie is a disaster of highest proportions. the jokes aren't funny. at all. ever. i'm not going to comment on plots, dialogue etc... as movies such as this aren't supposed to have any plot whatsoever but the least they could have done was make it funny.i tried to laugh at the beginning but i just... couldn't.some of the spoofs were meaningless, only there for the sake of it, as if they were trying to break the record for most spoofs ever in a film. this was absolutely awful the worst 2(ish) hours of my life i generally only give movies no stars if they offend me so i award one star (1 bonus star for carmen electra)

reviews.review_title: What a great Film If ur Braindead
reviews.content: It was only in my boredom i decided to watch this film and expected a good laugh. this film emphasizes the the talent of the wayan bros and other writer of scary movie 1 and 2. Throughout the plot is weak the premise of the film seems like a good idea but is poorly executed.tie ins to recent films are also poorly done as jack sparrow just appears during the middle of scenes and this sets the trend for the movie. the humour also is very weak when given potentially funny situations the butt for many of the jokes seems to be mtv i say mtv come out better for it, the humour is inappropriate and painful, the writers of this film really have to have a long think about what went wrong here before setting out on a new movie.the worst movie iv ever seen by a long shot made those 93 minutes seem like an entire lifetime including the horrific death.

When I got the movie in my hand, I was really excited - "Wow this is going to be real good fun like Scary Movies 1,3,4(i didn't like 2!)" Unfortunately the movie turned out to be a complete, utter disappointment.A story about 4 orphans and their journey from the Wonka factory to Narnia held a lot of potential as a spoof on epic movies.Everything from the storytelling, to the editing, to the acting was so amateur and so not funny - it seems like a bunch of 5th-6th graders got together and made this movie! Even funny actors like Kal Penn and the girl from the scary movies franchise were very disappointing.The movie is truly silly and a waste of time.Spend your money and/or time watching something else - anything else!Cheers, Tahaab

The movie was OK I think they could've made fun of the movies a bit better then they did, maybe thats why the movie was short. Basing the whole movie on "Gnarnia" I thought was a good idea. But some of the things were obvious and stupid. I thought some parts were good and some parts were just stupid. Like the part in the beginning where they make Willy Wonka's chocolate into poop. Just the whole Willy Wonka part of the movie I thought was stupid. I think they could've done more with the Nacho Libre part, but thats just my thought. My favorite part is when they made fun of "Pirates of the Caribbean". With Captain Jack Swallows. Over all I give this movie a 3 out of 5 or a 6 out of 10, whatever one you like, because it was just OK.

I loved this movie. Its awesome, but it's not the best piece of cinema ever to be devised. That being said, You will not stop laughing throughout the entire film. It's basically about 4 orphans from various backgrounds who are outcasts (spoofing The Davinci Code, Nacho Libre, X-men, and Snakes on a plane). They all wish they could leave, and they all find Golden Tickets. They go to the chocolate factory, (Charlie and the Chocolate Factory), and they meet Willy, who makes his candy using human body parts. they run away from him and find a hidden wardrobe which takes them to Gnarnia, where they meet Jack Swallows, (Pirates of the Caribean), and Harry Potter. there they must save Gnarnia from the White B**ch. You could be stoned to write this concept, but you still won't stop laughing. It's In between scary movie 3 and 4, and way better than Date Movie.

reviews.review_title: This movie will sniff your soul out
reviews.content: There is nothing to laugh at, ironically or unironically so dont even bother.

reviews.review_title: the worst thing ever created by the human species
reviews.content: I went to see this movie having loved SCARY MOVE, i think that DATE MOVIE is one of those "so bad it's good" movies, so i really love the "spoof film" thing. but seriously, nothing could prepare me for this thing that studios are trying to pass off as a film. there was not a single joke in the film that i haven't seen in any other comedy (bad comedy, too). and the fact that the producers looked at this film and said "Yes!" really means that anyone can make a film because the bar has been lowered so drastically (but is that a good thing or a bad thing?). so if you wish to actually spend your money and see this thing, go ahead but don't say nobody warned you.

My friends and I went to see this movie the other night after a stressful first week back to school. We all found this movie to be one of the best spoofs ever. We laughed the entire way through. It was able to take movies that have just been released and combine them all to make an EXCELLENT spoof on today's society. Many of the movies were put into a new light. Some may say that this movie is "just another spoof." That it's written poorly and uses the same material that other spoof movies have used. This is untrue. All the movies, except for one, have just been released and never spoofed before. While others make up their own story line, this took one story line and added elements from other movies in a way that made sense.A must see for anyone who loves comedic movies...

reviews.review_title: Did we see the same movie?
reviews.content: I had high hopes for Epic Moview as I love parodies of movies that take themselves so seriously. We were severely disappointed at the lack of writing/acting skills in this movie. We watched as long as we were able to stomach it. Some very good actors were cast but their talents were wasted in this lame send-up. Reading some of the comments that praised this movie made me wonder if we saw the same film. Some of them sounded like studio hacks that were told to praise this piece of garbage of lose their jobs. Now THAT is funny! Do not waste your time or money in renting this. My dollar rental at the video store was a total waste. The producers of this movie must have demanded payment up front and are laughing their asses off on a beach somewhere.

This was a pretty funny movie, Outside the movie people were talking about "Oh I like that part" and "I like him". and I must admit that it could've been much funnier and most of the scenes weren't very long. At some points It would show a spoof for 50 seconds or so. But I still laughed. I think it was the best "Movie" that the makers of Scary Movie have made. A lot better than Date Movie, And more of a plot than Scary Movie. There were some parts I say that could've been made a lo better. I especially thought that the Willy Wonkas factory could have been much longer. It didn't go on for very long. And the characters could have appeared more in the movie. If you do not plan to ever see this movie... I Suggest YOU DO, and If you do plan to see this movie... STAY DURING THE CREDITS!!!!!

Me and an accomplice went to this movie yesterday, and lets just say its bad. I am not going to look for bigger words just...bad. The editing job is bad. The plot is bad. The acting is bad. The jokes are beyond bad. This movie is taking humor that little 4 year olds would giggle at, and tries to apply it to an older audience. It just doesn't work. I left this movie and got my money back. Don't waste your time, don't waste your money. Don't even rent it. Let's all just pretend it never happened. Its sort of a trend...all the movies with '2 of the producers of scary movie' or '3 of the directors of scary movie'. they all suck. this movie doesn't get out of line. They needed the rest of the producers.

reviews.review_title: At least being drunk made it go faster.
reviews.content: Somehow we ended up at this movie, heavily intoxicated. At first I laughed at the slapstick Spanish orphans but then after my second toilet break the old liver kicked in. Very little-no plot, and really it has been done a dozen times before. I enjoyed seeing a few appearances from faces I recognized, however this was short lived after I realized I could also see them in good movies. Though I did wonder after wards why Pirates of the Caribbean needed to get Johnny Depp, this guy was a dead ringer. If you must see this movie, make sure you are extremely drunk, or with an attractive member of the opposite sex, since if nothing else it will make the time go faster.

Right, Scary Movie 1, 2, 3 and 4 were reasonably funny, not amazing, but were able to actually make me laugh, and when I saw the trailer for this film, it looked like it could also make me laugh. So I went to see it with three of my friends, and straight away wanting to leave. in the first half hour the creators had used the same idea of turning the original characters into gangsters. GET IT INTO YOUR HEADS, IT IS NOT FUNNY.It made me angry when other members of the audience laughed, and then I realised, despite the film being a 12a, most the kids looked around 9. The way the film attempts to make it a 'grown up' film by putting in an occasional blonde bikini model stoops very low.COMEDIES SHOULD ALWAYS BE ABLE TO MAKE YOU LAUGH!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Not as bad as I thought
reviews.content: OK, it wasn't a excellent film, but was actually alright and made me laugh a few times. I noticed it's rating so i decided to watch it because I wanted to check if it really was that bad. So even I didn't think it was brilliant. An OK film (actually, good enough) is not really doing so well.There was a few funny scenes, the best being punk'd. I thought it would be crap but it was actually OK. So, I don't care what other people say, this film is actually OK. Anyway,it seemed to get a lot of money in the cinema but no one liked it.It is worth watching, and is better than its sequel (which I rated 4 out of 10).I haven't seen Scary Movie so I cannot compare but I would also like to see that as well. So, i thought this film was definitely worth watching.

reviews.review_title: Waste of every one's time and money.
reviews.content: This is a movie that is simply waste of time and money.I had a real hard time to watch it.There are so many movies, they try to make fun off? You will keep on looking at the end to find out when is it going to be over.You keep on giving it a second chance that may be it is going to be interesting at the end....wrong....dead wrong... There are people claiming to be actor, I guess, but they simply suck. May be it is not their fault either, the plot if there is one, sucks. You are puzzled even at the end, trying to figure out what these folks were thinking when making such a movie.It is filled with vulgar/adult jokes that you have hard time watching with family.

Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!!Was a very funny movie....going to see for a second time tonight!!!! had to do that to take up more lines...sorry for spamming!

this movie was not worth my 10 dollars, the only good part about it was the end with borat, but that was only because it was stupid humor, nothing in this movie was smart, i could've made this with my friends. I was hoping for a more general list of movies, but they stuck to only a couple. Making the whole movie centre around narnia was pretty bad too, there's not a lot you can do with that, they shouldve moved on. The acting was horrible too, I know shes supposed to be a dump person but come on, she delayed in her comments too long, and the script was bad, why make her say the same thing 500 times, you can use it twice but never anymore.

Okay - this movie is really bad! And most of the time it is also not funny at all although tries to be. I watched it on DVD because I have a preference for trash-movies and I was curious to watch this since it was in the "Bottom 100" list of the worst films ever. Although it is bad, I must say that I saw a lot of films which are much worse than this one (e.g. "The silence of the Hams"). The idea of making a "funny" movie which contains no plot and simply consists of a sequence of parodies of other popular movies is really not fancy. At least you can watch it without the feeling that you are being tortured. Thus it did not deserve to be on the Bottom 100.

The only reason I didn't get up and leave after 30 minutes (because God knows, I was tempted) was that my kids were next to me. There was one "joke" in the beginning that elicited laughs from only two people in the entire theater. I'm thankful that I didn't have to pay to see this movie, we used a gift certificate.I was disappointed at the PG-13 rating. If I knew how crude and appalling some of the jokes were, we would have skipped it. It's just wrong. The amount of sexually explicit references really pushes it over the edge.Save your money. Take any small children by the hand and RUN!!!

OK, there might have been 1 or 2 funny parts in this movie but did anybody listen to the commentary. I rented this movie and like all movies that have it I usually like listening to the commentaries, no matter who's doing them. This was not the case for this movie. I don't know what movie they were commenting about but it sure wasn't epic movie. They talked about space travel, Russians, and worm holes. Now I could only stand to watch this movie once so I may be wrong but I don't remember any space travel, Russians, or worm holes anywhere in this movie. So what's worse than making a bad movie? Making an even worse commentary for the movie.

After watching this movie, I learned that there are better things in life, and this is one of them.Actually, this is what I WANTED it to be. Unfortunately, I was wrong. If you are below the age of 14, then you may like this movie. Others, do not even bother looking at the movie poster. I decided one day to see how truly awesome it was as everyone had said at our area. I came out of that movie theater with 12 pounds of gauze and a razor blade jammed deeply into both wrists.The problem is, this movie TRIES to be funny with movies of various genres. This is like trying to shove a quarter into your brain to gain more sense. IT JUST ISN'T GOING TO WORK. And what is worse, is how short it is, although that is a pleasure, since no one would want to watch 2 hours of that crap.So, if you like immature jokes involving break-dancing, crap in a chocolate factory, or like to see music in the wrong situations, watch this movie. Otherwise, you're better off having more fun playing 5 Finger Filet. With yourself. And not getting surgery.
